testimonials.quote_1: StartInsight helped me validate my SaaS idea before writing a single line of code. The 8-dimension score gave me confidence to quit my job.
testimonials.quote_2: The AI research reports are incredible. I used the TAM analysis and competitor breakdown to raise $500K seed funding.
testimonials.quote_3: I wish I had this tool before building my first startup. Would have saved me 6 months of building the wrong thing.
